subject: Re: Shipping question
description_text:
I don't think I understood, sorry. My friend gave me this address, but I
don't know how to separate it into the fields requested on the official
Simson website. Could you separate all of this for me?

浙江省金华市义乌市廿三里街道陈陀村65幢5单元 小章 13065917319
注意： （拒收没有麦头，拒收没有编织袋）
收货时间：10:30点-5点钟
注意：送货前半小时联系收货人！！！不然拒收！！！
统一需要送货清单不然一律拒收！！！

First Name:
Last Name:
Address:
Apartment, suite, etc.
City:
Province:
Postal Code:
Phone:


El jue, 16 oct 2025 a las 11:35, General and sales enquiries (<
service@simsonn.com>) escribió:

> You can place an order on the official website and fill in China or any
> other address. We will ship the goods to the Zhejiang, China address you
> provided.
>
>
>
> ----------Reply to Message----------
> On Thu, Oct 16, 2025 22:14 PM Matias Romero<mromero@xelere.com> wrote:
> Thanks!
> One more question: When I make purchases on Alibaba that have a single
> field, I enter all this text, but now it asks me for each piece of
> information separately. Could you help me separate it, because I have no
> idea what each item is?
>
> 浙江省金华市义乌市廿三里街道陈陀村65幢5单元 小章 13065917319
> 注意： （拒收没有麦头，拒收没有编织袋）
> 收货时间：10:30点-5点钟
> 注意：送货前半小时联系收货人！！！不然拒收！！！
> 统一需要送货清单不然一律拒收！！！
>
> First Name:
> Last Name:
> Address:
> Apartment, suite, etc.
> City:
> Province:
> Postal Code:
> Phone:
>
>
> El jue, 16 oct 2025 a las 10:27, General and sales enquiries (<
> service@simsonn.com>) escribió:
>
>> Of course, you can provide your Chinese address.
>>
>>
>>
>> ----------Reply to Message----------
>> On Thu, Oct 16, 2025 21:26 PM Matias Romero<mromero@xelere.com> wrote:
>> Hello.
>> I want to buy a pedal baseplate. Can I send it to an address in mainland
>> China and will it arrive without any additional processing or charges?
>>
>> Just to put this in context, an acquaintance would receive it at that
>> location in China and then bring it to me in his luggage when he returns
>> from his trip.
>>
>> Regards.
>>
>

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 4958 中
